Why Choose Sampada VR?

Discover what makes us the preferred choice for retinal care and eye health

What Sets Us Apart

Experience the difference of specialized, compassionate care

Expert Specialists

Led by Dr. Sameera V V, our team consists of highly qualified retinal specialists with years of experience in complex eye conditions.

Advanced Technology

State-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment equipment including OCT, laser systems, and advanced imaging technology.

Patient-Centered Care

Every patient receives personalized attention with treatment plans tailored to their specific needs and conditions.

Timely Care

Quick appointment scheduling and minimal wait times for urgent cases requiring immediate attention.

Comfortable Environment

Modern, clean facilities designed to provide a comfortable and stress-free experience for patients.

Safety First

Strict adherence to international safety standards and protocols for all procedures and treatments.

Specialized Retinal Care

Unlike general eye clinics, Sampada VR focuses exclusively on retinal disorders and conditions. This specialization allows us to provide deeper expertise and more effective treatments for complex retinal issues that require specialized knowledge and equipment.

  • Dedicated retinal specialists with advanced training
  • Specialized equipment for retinal diagnosis and treatment
  • Comprehensive treatment for all retinal conditions
  • Pediatric retinal care including ROP screening
  • Advanced surgical techniques and procedures
  • Long-term follow-up and monitoring

Cutting-Edge Technology

We invest in the latest medical technology to ensure accurate diagnosis and effective treatment. Our advanced equipment enables us to detect and treat retinal conditions with precision and confidence.

OCT Imaging

High-resolution retinal imaging

Visual Field Testing

Comprehensive vision assessment

Fundus Photography

Detailed retinal documentation

Advanced Laser Systems

Precise treatment delivery
